item.title: #TIL : F-cking stupid limit of input vars
item.description: F-cking stupid limit of input vars Today, I tried to debug many hours to find out why my POST request missing some data (specify _token hidden field). :disappointed: I tried to config NGINX and PHPFPM max_post_size, client_max_body_size but they still gone. After 2-3 hours searching on Google, I found the link from PHP.net, it has a config value about limiting max input vars (default = 1000), so it causes the problem about missing data.
